arts.ttl: Aston Villa make official Premier League complaint after Manchester United controversy creates transfer uncertainty
arts.sum: Aston Villa will make an official complaint to the Premier League after a controversial refereeing decision led to them missing out on the Champions League.

arts.ttl: Man United squad fly straight to Malaysia for £8m post-season tour just HOURS after beating Aston Villa to end their worst-ever Premier League term
arts.sum: The Manchester United squad flew out to Malaysia just hours after salvaging some pride from their worst Premier League season ever by beating Aston Villa 2-0 on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa issue furious public complaint after huge goal controversy in Manchester United loss
arts.sum: Aston Villa have questioned the selection of “second least experienced” referee Thomas Bramall

arts.ttl: BREAKING: Aston Villa release angry statement and demand action after Man Utd controversy
arts.sum: Aston Villa were left hugely frustrated as a controversial decision against Manchester United saw them miss out on a place in the Champions League on the final day of the campaign

arts.ttl: Aston Villa launch Premier League complaint after major Man Utd controversy
arts.sum: The Athletic report that Villa will complain to the Premier League that a more senior official was not assigned to the game. Aston Villa had a goal controversially ruled out two minutes before Manchester United took the lead and ultimately ended their hopes of qualifying for the Champions League.

arts.ttl: Manchester United controversially end Aston Villa’s Champions League hopes
arts.sum: Morgan Rogers’ goal was wrongly disallowed before Amad Diallo and Christian Eriksen scored for United.

arts.ttl: Premier League Match Centre issue statement as Aston Villa denied crucial goal at Man Utd
arts.sum: Aston Villa were denied a certain goal when Morgan Rogers was judged to have fouled Manchester United goalkeeper Altay Bayindir with the score still level at Old Trafford

arts.ttl: Newcastle v Everton, Fulham v Manchester City, and more: Premier League final day – live
arts.sum: Premier League season final day, kick-offs at 4pm BST Live scores | Premier League table | Golden Boot race It’s great when you’re eighth... yeah There may yet be a Conference League place for the team that finishes eighth. And that team will be Brighton, just as long as they get at least a draw away to a team who have justifiably spent the last few days imbibing pints of 17 Year Itch. Should Spurs beat Brighton, Brentford will go above them if they win at Wolves. Chelsea win the Conference League and Chelsea finish seventh in the Premier League (which isn’t beyond the realms) or Chelsea finish sixth and Newcastle seventh. The latter is mathematically possible but let’s not go there again. Manchester City will qualify if they drew at Fulham. Mathematicians will tell you otherwise, but they need to live a little. If you said 420 to them the first think they’d think is ‘60 x 7', could also be 105 x 4’. Newcastle need to beat Everton to be sure of finishing in the top five. A draw will be enough if Aston Villa fail to win at Old Trafford or Chelsea draw at the City Ground. Chelsea must – must – beat Nottingham Forest at the City Ground to be sure. A draw will only be enough if Villa fail to win at Old Trafford or Newcastle suffer death by Moyes at St James’ Park. Aston Villa will qualify if they beat Man Utd and one of the following happens: Man City lose at Fulham, Newcastle fail to win, Chelsea fail to win. A draw could be good enough, but only in the sense that Donald Trump could wake up tomorrow morning with the temperament of the Dalai Lama. Nottingham Forest need to beat Chelsea and hope that Newcastle or Villa fail to win. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: What TV channel is Man Utd v Aston Villa on? Kick-off time and live stream details
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim's side welcome Villa to Old Trafford for their final game of the season

arts.ttl: Manchester United vs Aston Villa – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Manchester United host Aston Villa in their final fixture of the 2024/25 Premier League campaign. Ruben Amorim’s side conclude a torrid campaign at Old Trafford that will end with the club’s lowest league finish and lowest points total of the Premier League era. United suffered a further setback in midweek after losing the Europa League […] The post Manchester United vs Aston Villa – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.
